Room.Name: The Rusty Dagger Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Rusty Dagger's Training Room for Assassins.
Room.LongDescription: Only assassins aspiring to be Rutterkins may train in this center. Once you reach the level of Rutterkin First Class, you may no longer train in this center. Your brothers suggest trying to find the Dripping Dagger in northeast Oceancrest to further develop your skills.
